title: The Aging Father and His Sons
caption: A father, nearing his end, sees his sons constantly bickering. He worries about their future. He decides to teach them a valuable lesson about unity. Their discord weakens them.
prompt: A wise-looking, elderly man sitting surrounded by his three sons, who appear sullen and argumentative. The setting is a simple, rustic home interior, perhaps a living room with a fireplace. Focus on the contrast between the father's weary but determined expression and the sons' discontent.

title: The Bundle of Sticks
caption: He calls them to him and presents a bundle of sticks tightly bound. He challenges each son to break the bundle. They try with all their might, but fail. Individually, they are weak.
prompt: A close-up shot of a tightly bound bundle of sticks. Emphasize the strength and rigidity of the bundle. Show the hands of a young man struggling to break the bundle, with visible strain and frustration.

title: Breaking the Sticks One by One
caption: The father unties the bundle and hands each son a single stick. He asks them to break it. With ease, each son snaps his stick in half. Separately, they are easily broken.
prompt: A young man easily snapping a single stick in half. Focus on the ease with which it breaks, contrasting with the previous struggle. Show the broken stick lying in his hand.

title: The Lesson Learned
caption: The father explains, 'My sons, like these sticks, you are strong together, but weak apart.' Unity is their strength. Division leaves them vulnerable.
prompt: The father looking directly at his sons, his expression conveying wisdom and sincerity. The broken sticks are scattered on the floor. The sons are looking at their father with understanding dawning on their faces.

title: Working Together - Harvesting
caption: The sons, now understanding, work together in the fields, harvesting crops. They support each other, lifting heavy loads as a team. Teamwork makes their work easier.
prompt: Three young men working together in a field of wheat or corn. They are smiling and appear to be collaborating effectively. Focus on the sense of cooperation and shared effort.

title: Building Together - A Home
caption: The brothers collaborate in building a sturdy structure, perhaps a new barn or a larger house for their family. Their combined skills create something strong and lasting. Construction needs unity.
prompt: The three brothers working together to build a wooden structure, maybe the frame of a house or a barn. Emphasize the teamwork and coordination involved in the construction process. Show them lifting a heavy beam together.

title: Protecting Each Other - A Threat
caption: The sons stand shoulder-to-shoulder, protecting their family and their land from a perceived threat, perhaps a wild animal or a potential intruder. Unity brings security.
prompt: The three brothers standing side-by-side, facing forward with determined expressions. They could be holding farming tools as weapons or simply standing defensively. The background is a farm with a suggestion of a possible threat in the distance.

title: A Prosperous Future
caption: The family, now unified and working together, prospers. Their farm is abundant, their family is happy, and their future is secure. Unity brings prosperity.
prompt: A panoramic view of a thriving farm. The fields are full of crops, the animals are healthy, and the family is gathered together in the foreground, smiling and happy. Emphasize the sense of abundance and well-being.

title: The Legacy of Unity
caption: The father, now old and content, watches his sons and grandchildren working together, carrying on the tradition of unity and cooperation. The lesson lives on.
prompt: The elderly father, sitting in a rocking chair, watching his sons and grandchildren working together in the field. He has a peaceful and contented expression on his face. The scene conveys a sense of legacy and the enduring power of unity.

title: Bundle of Sticks - Symbol of Strength
caption: A visual reminder: a bundle of sticks, tightly bound with rope, symbolizes the strength and resilience that comes from unity and working together. Unity is always the best way.
prompt: A close-up, slightly abstract image of a bundle of sticks, tightly bound with rope. The lighting should be dramatic, emphasizing the texture of the wood and the strength of the binding. This serves as a symbol of the entire moral of the story.
